import React, { useState } from 'react'; import './contact.css'; const ContactForm = () => { const [status, setStatus] = useState('Send'); const handleSubmit = async e => { e.preventDefault(); setStatus('Sending...'); const { name, email, message, phone } = e.target.elements; const details = { name: name.value, email: email.value, phone: phone.value, message: message.value, }; const response = await fetch('http://localhost:8000/contact', { method: 'POST', headers: { 'Content-Type': 'application/json;charset=utf-8', }, body: JSON.stringify(details), }); setStatus('Send'); const result = await response.json(); alert(result.status); }; return (
